name: Create a deposit of a value greater than zero
scenarioId: classpath:features/transaction/create_transfer:Create a deposit of a value greater than zero
methodName: Create a deposit of a value greater than zero

testSteps.description: Given the user has an active account in Tyny Bank
And the destination account "987" is chosen for transfer
When the user makes a deposit of "100.00"
Then the destination account balance is increased by "100.00"

reportData.title: Transaction Final State
reportData.contents: <200 OK OK,RestResponse(message=Transaction Registered Successfully, data={id=48f379af-9719-4dc8-b6d3-9c91287e51d9, originAccountId=202401230001, destinationAccountId=null, amount=100.0, type=DEPOSIT, accountBalanceCurrentValue=100.0, accountDestinationBalanceCurrentValue=0.0, date=2024-12-26T02:39:50.968184645}),[content-type:"application/json", date:"Thu, 26 Dec 2024 02:39:50 GMT", transfer-encoding:"chunked"]>

testSteps.description: And the origin account balance is decreased by "100.00"

userStory.narrative:
The transfer transaction is a credit to the account balance in the account origin and a debit in the account destination.
  The transfer must be a transaction with value greater than zero and it needs the origin account and the destination account.

  **As a** Tiny Bank client
  **I want to** transfer a value to a destination bank account
  **So that I can** debit value to my account balance and credit value to the destination account balance

title: Create a deposit of a value greater than zero

rule.name: A transfer to a user account must be a value greater than zero
